statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

article.description: Richmond tops St Bonaventure on late shot, 64-62
article.headline: Richmond tops St Bonaventure on late shot, 64-62
article.linkText: Richmond tops St Bonaventure on late shot, 64-62
article.story: RICHMOND, Va. -- Kendall Anthony's jumper with five seconds left lifted Richmond to a 64-62 come-from-behind win over St. Bonaventure Wednesday night. Dion Wright pulled the Bonnies even with 3:40 left to play by converting two free throws and gave them the lead with a layup less than a minute later. Terry Allen answered with 1:32 to tie the score. Matthew Wright missed a 3-point attempt and Charlon Kloof missed a jumper for St. Bonaventure. Anthony finished with 28 points to lead the Spiders, with Allen adding 14 and ShawnDre' Jones contributing 13. Richmond (15-8, 5-3 Atlantic 10) shot 39.6 percent from the floor (21 of 53) and was 7 of 17 from long range. Matthew Wright scored 17 points and Youssou Ndoye added 15 points and seven rebounds for St. Bonaventure (13-9, 3-5), which was 21 of 52 from the field (40.4 percent) and outrebounded Richmond 38-29.
